review: As soon as I entered, she made a wierd face. When I started describing the issue, she was giving wierd expressions. She was in a hurry, I don't know why! She was not ready to listen. This is the first time I met such an arrogant doctor. Wouldn't recommend her to anyone. Now even if I get a free follow up, I am not going!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: The doctor spent less than 10 seconds to examine the issue. She seemed in a rush. She ended up prescribing me steroids. The problem has exacerbated and I am now struggling a lot. Consulting with a specialist now.  According to the specialist, steroids shouldn't have been prescribed.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Doctor was not at all friendly. She seemed very disconnected from what she was doing. She was too impatient to listen all concerns carefully or to explain back us about the situation or line of treatment.

Not at all reliable. ****** ****** ****** * ******* ***** ** ** *** **** ******* When we had asked on our own , then she asked us to get all sorts of teats done vendors including the ones which she had already asked us to do , which proves that how ignorant is she.

** ** **** *** ********* ********** ** ***** **** **** **** ******** ****** ***** ******* ** ****** ******

The doc was  unfriendly, didn’t seem cordial. She kept looking at me So weirdly throughout the appointment and I felt so uncomfortable. And she seemed in a hurry. I was explaining my issues to her and before I could complete or tell more symptoms she jotted down medicines already without any further clarification or explanation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: One visits the doctor when things are not in control.  The doctor is least bothered about patient's mental state. I felt it was not worth of time and money visiting her. She did seem to be in a hurry to wrap up the appointment quickly . When asked what precautions to take, she asked rudely What precautions..Will never visit her again!

tags: Wait time,
review: simple, straight forward. didn't have to wait. get prescription. took medicines from pharmacy and left within 20 mins

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Most experienced.  Availability at the appointment time given.  She has explained the problem and suggested investigations required.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We had a 2:30 pm appointment but before us some family entered her cabin without informing reception. She talked to them for 45 mins while all her patients were waiting. Once we got it she was in a very foul mood, didn’t listen to our concerns and just wrote medication for each concern.

Usually she’s good at her job, but often in a hurry and sometimes just doesn’t listen to the patient. 

And we pay for the appointment, ***** *** ********* ** ** *** *****

The apollo doctor prescribed an injection, the apollo pharmacy didn't have the injection so they asked me to skip it. *** ***** **** **** ***** ****** *** **** *** the doctor was very rude *** ***** I was not helped and I definately did not recieve the ***** treatment.

I visited her on a Friday and she didn't even give enough time to listen to what I had to say. It was like go do these tests and then come back. If someone is paying you 750rs, they do deserve your time. Empathize with your patients. Even the staffs were really rude and not supportive.

Horrible experience I ever had with any doctor. She was very unfriendly. She was not rude but she had a lot of attitude. Didn’t even bother to spend 5 mins for listening to my issue and treating it
 Didn’t even check my report’s properly and without checking she was confident about my issue. Did not provide any proper medicine. Hated it. Will never recommend and visit again

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I consulted the doctor for allergy. She was so rude, she didn’t let me explain the problem. *** **** **** ***** ********* *********** **** * **** *** * *** ****** ** ******** *** ***** ******* ********* She seemed to be some kind of hurry, was not respectful to me and my husband. I hope this review reaches her and it is helpful for others.
